properties.name: dinolupo.annotations.security.collection
properties.description: Name of the MongoDB collection that contains the roles and username information

properties.name: dinolupo.annotations.security.role-path
properties.description: Path inside the collection that contains the roles array or the role value

properties.name: dinolupo.annotations.security.username-path
properties.description: Path inside the 'collection' that contains the username to match
